meanings.definition: Affected by a strike or strikes, as a factory or industry.
meanings.sent1: The strikebound factory struggled to meet production deadlines.
meanings.sent2: The strikebound industry faced financial challenges due to the ongoing strikes.
meanings.sent3: The strikebound factory had to get creative with its limited resources.
meanings.sent4: The strikebound industry was a ship lost at sea, unable to find its way back to prosperity.
meanings.sent5: The strikebound factory was like a wounded bird, unable to soar to its full potential.

meanings.definition: Subject to or characterized by strikes.
meanings.sent1: The strikebound workers demanded better working conditions.
meanings.sent2: The strikebound company struggled to negotiate with the labor union.
meanings.sent3: The strikebound workers organized a dance-off instead of a picket line.
meanings.sent4: The strikebound company was a battlefield of conflicting interests.
meanings.sent5: The strikebound workers were like warriors fighting for their rights on the picket line.
